author: David Richards
comment: I have reinstalled this face several times and it crashes, all I get is " UNFORTUNATELY CKOCKSTER HAS STOPPED WORKING" I WANT A REFUND. The free version works although limited. 😬

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Let us know your order number.

title: Horrible

author: Nicolas Castillo
comment: Paid version will continually crash.  Only version that works is the free one.  The look of the watch face is awesome on the screen shots wish I could use the app.  Please refund or fix the app.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: We find and fix localization bug.Please, reinstall for update. Thanks.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs

comment: It says it's stopped. Not working. Please refund. The non pro version works fine. Update still not working. Free version works.

title: I'm having the same issue

author: Jim Patteson
comment: After installing every time I tried to open/configure it I got "unfortunately clock master pro has stopped"? If you get this fixed, I'll come back and buy it. Zenwatch 2.   Thx. Jim.....2/27 Paid/downloaded,same problem? But, this time I didn't get a refund.....?

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: This error occurs if you try to run the configuration before watch face established in smart watch. Wait when the watch face is established in the smart watch. This is a short time of about 5 seconds. On the smart watch you see a notification that the watch face is installed.Your payment has been refunded. A new version(2.1.0) is now available.

reply.content:
Please, set watch face through Android Wear assistant.
A new version is available.
